entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2004/2. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-G16: TÁRKI Omnibus 2004/2. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2010-11-23

entry.dcterms:subject: demography
economic conditions and indicators
mass political behavior, attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section
Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the Leslie Kish key and the random walking method.
face-to-face interview
1. block (1-18. quest.): A, 2. block (19-28. quest.): D
